QuestData.Title: The Brothers Bronzebeard
QuestData.Description: That does it! We finally have the keystone... It's beautiful! I've been around the world more than once, but this thing's got me all jittery with excitement again. I suppose now's not the time to stop and admire though, we need to get the heck out of here.$B$BHop on my flying machine and help keep us covered from those iron dwarves on the way out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Brann Bronzebeard and his flying machine to Frosthold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Velog Icebellow at Frosthold in The Storm Peaks.
QuestData.CompletionText: My pardons, $glad:lass;! I got all caught up in tha moment and I neglected ye entirely.
QuestData.RewardText: King Stormheart sends his most sincere thanks for reuniting him with his brothers. It seems he's off to settle a score now - perhaps you'll meet with him again on Arthas's doorstep.
